entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
